mapper.sql: prt.ht_purchase_return_det_id, prt.purchase_return_det_id, prt.purchase_return_id, prt.material_id, prt.plan_outquantity, prt.reality_outquantity, prt.plan_price, prt.reality_price, prt.warehouse_id, prt.warehouse_user_id, prt.`status`, prt.organization_id, prt.remark, prt.create_user_id, prt.create_time, prt.modified_user_id, prt.modified_time, prt.is_delete
mapper.select:
SELECT , su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, suy.user_name AS warehouse_user_name, pr.purchase_return_code, m.material_code, m.material_name, w.warehouse_code, w.warehouse_name, bo.organization_name FROM wms_out_ht_purchase_return_det AS prt LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user su ON prt.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user sus ON prt.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user suy ON prt.warehouse_user_id = suy.user_id LEFT JOIN wms_out_purchase_return pr ON prt.purchase_return_id = pr.purchase_return_id LEFT JOIN smt_material m ON prt.material_id = m.material_id LEFT JOIN smt_warehouse w ON prt.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes_v2.base_organization bo ON prt.organization_id = bo.organization_id
and date_format(prt.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and pr.purchase_return_code like CONCAT('%', #{purchaseReturnCode}, '%')
and m.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and m.material_name like CONCAT('%', #{materialName}, '%')
and w.warehouse_code like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseCode}, '%')
and w.warehouse_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseName}, '%')
